prompts.text: Explain async and await in C# in exactly 8 concise bullet points.
Write a clean C# example that uses HttpClient to call a REST API, handles errors properly, and explains the code with inline comments.
Based on the text above, summarize the key design tradeoffs in exactly 10 bullet points.
Write a detailed, structured tutorial explaining .NET Native AOT, including history, benefits, limitations, real-world use cases, and future direction.
